---
name: create
description: "Create north star or goal. Usage: /create north-star OR /create goal [ns-id]"
arguments:
  - name: type
    description: "north-star or goal"
    required: true
  - name: target
    description: "For goal: north-star-id (e.g., ns1)"
    required: false
allowed-tools:
  - Read
  - Write
  - Edit
  - Glob
  - Grep
  - Bash
  - AskUserQuestion
